channel.title: Migration guides on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Migration guides on Security365 Docs

item.title: Changes to HTTP DCV
item.description: Changes to HTTP DCVAfter October 21, 2021, you will also no longer be able to issue new wildcard certificates or validate existing certificates up for renewal using HTTP Domain Control Validation (DCV). ​​ What is affected? If you are affected by this change, you should have also received an email from Cloudflare. ​​ Advanced certificates This change affects customers using Advanced certificates for wildcard certificates or certificates with multiple SANs.
